long_description:
Oh, the weather outside is frightful! What a splendid opportunity to sip on hot cocktails in New York. Do you know what else would top any outing in New York this winter? A great view of the city’s skyline. You can find exactly that with these rooftop bars.

Rooftop at Royalton Park Avenue

Location: 420 Park Avenue South, New York, NY 10016
Let’s start with our very own rooftop bar with sweeping views of Park Avenue. Our menu includes original snack with vegetarian and vegan options that pair perfectly with our Happy Hour drinks, Monday to Friday from 4pm to 7pm. Check out our monthly entertainment calendar.

St. Cloud Rooftop Bar

Location: 6 Times Square 17th Floor, New York, NY 10036
St. Cloud has a luxurious rooftop bar with three plush corner Sky Pods overlooking Times Square. Expect small plates of seasonal and gourmet food, cocktails, craft beers and entertainment.

The Lodge at Gallow Green

Location: 542 West 27th Street, New York, NY 10001
Bringing the great outdoors to the city, The Lodge is Gallow Green’s answer to New York’s need for intimate and snug spaces. As a seasonal bar, make sure you visit ASAP, especially on a blustery day.

The Skylark

Location: 200 West 39th Street, New York, NY 10018
A classic cocktail bar that screams Manhattan, the Skylark offers views of the Hudson River and the best of Midtown from its floor to ceiling windows. If you are looking for a dessert to go with your drink, try their warm cookie skillets.

Refinery Rooftop Bar

Location: 63 West 38th street, New York, NY 10018
When a bar has a retractable ceiling, you know you’re in for a unique experience. But the Refinery is also known for its outstanding and hip selection of signature cocktails with out-of-the-ordinary ingredients.

Mr. Purple

Location: 180 Orchard Street, 15th Floor, New York, NY 10002
Whether you want to stay on the terrace or hide from the cold indoors, Mr. Purple is right for any occasion. Serving culinary staples prepared with local ingredients, they also have an extensive drinks menu that includes cocktails, wines, spirits, craft beers and more.

Are you ready to start planning your winter vacation in New York? Take a look at the best hotel deals in New York, right here at the Royalton Park Avenue, your chic and trendy home away from home.
title: Best Rooftop Bars to Visit this Winter
